analysis.key_quote: Making scientific leaders at NIH political appointees, characterizing them as policymaking positions is detrimental to the mission of the NIH, and threatens the health and economic bases on which our nation depends.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of keeping politics out of scientific processes and highlights the detrimental effects of politicizing leadership positions at NIH, which aligns with concerns about politicization and scientific integrity.
